channel.title: Crafting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Crafting" - Discussion of Crafting

item.title: Crafting
item.content:encoded:
As some of you have no doubt noted, I've created a few crafting diagrams.

  • Boots
  • Cloaks
  • Cowls
  • Pistols
  • Scythes
  • Shades

Unless I note an objection, I'm planning to add cross-references from the items and the items pages within the next week.

Are there any other diagrams that you feel should be created?

Edit: The planned cross-references have been added. I'm considering a few other diagrams, particuarly Emergency Rations.
